EmailTemplate.name: LE-2022-06-21202206-HP-ENT-SEVT-2022-AHIP-CONFERENCE.Post Event Attendee
EmailTemplate.subject: It was great seeing you at AHIP 2022!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you!
Image Senior woman doctor consult on phone
We hope you enjoyed AHIP 2022 as much as we did, listening and learning from industry leaders about ideas, solutions and emerging trends in healthcare. Thanks also for taking the time to meet with us to discuss how Teladoc Health is helping to enrich and improve the healthcare experience for all.
We’d also like to invite you to register for Forum 2022 <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/?utm_source=ahip-email&utm_medium=paid&utm_content=healthplan&utm_campaign=forum-22]]>, a Teladoc Health-hosted event where we bring together thousands of virtual care leaders from around the world to share ideas and innovations for the future of healthcare. Join us in Boston, or virtually from your office.
Join us at Forum 2022! July 20–22 | Boston + Virtual
Register now <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/?utm_source=ahip-email&utm_medium=paid&utm_content=healthplan&utm_campaign=forum-22]]>
If you are interested in learning more about our whole-person virtual care solutions, or there is anything else you need, feel free to contact us <[[https://teladochealth.com/contact/?utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email&utm_content=health-plan&utm_campaign=202206-hp-ent-sevt-2022-ahip-conference]]> anytime.
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
